Reviews.Title: Awesome camera. So affordable
Reviews.Author: Antonio Nolan
Reviews.Content: This camera is very affordable with great features like 16 Megapixels, 5x Optical zoom, 2.7 inch screen. Very easy to use that I did not need to read the user manual to get things going. Runs on AA batteries. If you run out of juice, you can just buy 2 batteries at nearby convenience stores. Good size. Speaker is at bottom of camera so sound is a bit muffled when recording video. Recommended purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, eassy to use with excellent results....
Reviews.Author: D. Napoli "Brooklyn Born"
Reviews.Content: Features galore, easy to use, comfortable and easy to have with you for all occasionsEasily used by adults and children!

Reviews.Title: Lame LCD
Reviews.Author: DrewSpencley
Reviews.Content: The overall picture is pretty good after you upload it but when you look through your pics on the camera they are all super bright and very foggy. The double AA battery feature makes it hard for me to take this camera seriously. Macro mode is kinda nice. Things get over exposed alot (That happens with a lot of cameras though). I'd buy it for kids/teens ages 10-15 that's about all.
